achievements: Responsible for frontend team technical architecture design and tech stack selection
Established frontend engineering system, improving team efficiency by 30%
Led large-scale project refactoring, improving performance by over 50%
Mentored 3 junior developers to become intermediate engineers
Obtained PMP and ACP certifications, enhancing project management capabilities
Independently responsible for development and maintenance of multiple medium-to-large frontend projects
Established component library and design system, improving development efficiency
Optimized project build process, reducing build time by 60%
Participated in mobile hybrid app development, accumulating cross-platform experience
Built frontend tech stack and development standards from scratch
Responsible for frontend development of company official website and management backend
Implemented responsive design, supporting multi-terminal access
Participated in product requirement analysis and technical solution design
Learned modern frontend development technologies and tools
Participated in frontend development of internal enterprise systems
Mastered basic HTML, CSS, JavaScript skills
Established good programming habits and code standard awareness

hero.description: A curation of my exploration in frontend engineering and project management over the last decade. Each project is a pursuit of excellence.

digital-garden.title: Digital Garden
digital-garden.description: Personal tech blog and knowledge sharing platform, recording technical growth and project management practices.

featured-work.title: Featured Work
featured-work.description: Core technical projects and innovative practices, showcasing frontend depth and architectural capabilities.

community.title: Community Projects
community.description: Open source contributions and community participation, driving technical ecosystem development.

aiyazone-blog.name: AIYAZONE Blog
aiyazone-blog.description: VitePress-based tech blog sharing frontend development and project management experiences.
aiyazone-blog.fullDescription: AIYAZONE Blog is a modern technical blog built with VitePress, aimed at sharing deep articles on frontend development, architecture design, and project management. Content is written in Markdown and deployed automatically via Git workflows.
challenges: How to implement efficient content management and publishing
How to optimize SEO and loading performance
How to design a clear knowledge navigation system
solutions: Use VitePress as SSG combined with GitHub Actions
Custom theme and layout for better reading experience
learnings: Deep understanding of VitePress build principles

fe-docs.name: Frontend Tech Stack Docs
fe-docs.description: Systematic frontend technical knowledge system, covering basics to architecture design.
fe-docs.fullDescription: A comprehensive frontend knowledge base covering HTML/CSS/JS basics, Vue/React framework principles, engineering, and performance optimization. Aimed at helping developers build a complete technical system.
challenges: Keeping docs up to date with fast-moving tech
Providing high quality examples and cases
solutions: Regular review and updates monitoring community
Mind maps and knowledge graphs to link concepts
Runnable code examples with online tools
learnings: Improved documentation and knowledge sharing skills

pm-knowledge.name: Project Management Knowledge
pm-knowledge.description: PMP/ACP learning materials and practice sharing, boosting PM capabilities.
pm-knowledge.fullDescription: Integrated PMP and ACP core knowledge with practical project experience, providing a pragmatic project management methodology.
challenges: Solving common PM pain points (communication, risks)
solutions: Real case analysis demonstrating theory application
Practical tools like communication templates and risk registers
learnings: Deep understanding of PMBOK process groups and knowledge areas
Improved ability to solve complex project problems

zenparticles.name: ZenParticles
zenparticles.description: WebGL-based particle system visualization project exploring frontend graphics.
zenparticles.fullDescription: ZenParticles is a high-performance visualization project focusing on WebGL particle effects. Using Three.js and custom Shaders, it achieves real-time rendering of million-level particles.
challenges: Efficient rendering of massive particles in browser
Maintaining high frame rate and low memory usage
solutions: Custom Shaders for position and color calculation
Optimized memory management avoiding frequent GC
learnings: Improved graphics algorithms and performance optimization

sun-travel.name: Sun Travel
sun-travel.description: Modern travel planning app integrating maps, routes, and itinerary management.
sun-travel.fullDescription: Sun Travel is a one-stop travel planning app. Integrated with Amap API, it provides intelligent route planning, attraction recommendations, and itinerary management.
challenges: Handling complex map interactions and route calculations
solutions: Encapsulated map components for unified state management
PWA technology for offline access and cloud sync
learnings: Mastered Map API development and integration
Improved ability to handle complex business logic

personal-brand-system.name: Personal Brand System
personal-brand-system.description: Personal brand website showcasing tech stack and project management capabilities.
personal-brand-system.fullDescription: My digital business card showcasing my tech stack, project experience, career planning, and personal brand. Built with the latest frontend stack, focusing on design and UX.
challenges: Designing a unique and professional visual style
Building a maintainable and scalable architecture
solutions: Modular architecture with Vue 3 Composition API
CSS animations and transitions for enhanced UX
learnings: Improved full-stack and product design skills

vue-performance-toolkit.name: Vue Performance Toolkit
vue-performance-toolkit.description: Performance analysis and optimization tools for Vue.js applications.
vue-performance-toolkit.fullDescription: A suite of performance analysis and optimization tools designed for Vue.js developers to quickly identify bottlenecks and provide optimization suggestions.
challenges: Accurately collecting Vue component performance metrics
Minimizing the tool's own performance overhead
solutions: Using Vue Devtools API and Performance API
Lightweight design with lazy loading analysis modules
learnings: Deep understanding of Vue internals and rendering mechanism
Improved tool development and DX design skills

frontend-interview-guide.name: Frontend Interview Guide
frontend-interview-guide.description: Systematic interview preparation materials covering technical and management dimensions.
frontend-interview-guide.fullDescription: More than just a question bank, a complete interview preparation scheme covering basics to system design, technical depth to management breadth.
solutions: Principle analysis combined with practical cases
Added soft skills and project management content

open-source-contributions.name: Open Source Contributions
open-source-contributions.description: Contributions to various open source projects including Vue ecosystem and tools.
open-source-contributions.fullDescription: A record of my participation in the open source community. Giving back through PRs, bug fixes, and documentation improvements.
solutions: Reading source and docs, starting from small issues
Strict adherence to code standards and commit guides
learnings: Improved code reading and debugging skills
Learned excellent open source architecture and practices

strategicRecommendations: Focus on developing frontend architecture design and system design capabilities
Deepen performance optimization and engineering professional skills
Build personal technical brand and influence

roadmap.title: Frontend Architect Development Roadmap
roadmap.description: 24-month phased learning + practice roadmap, aiming to become a 40-60K tier frontend architect in Shenzhen market

1.name: Architecture Foundation Phase (0-6 Months)
objectives: Complete small to medium project architecture design

1.title: Architecture Theory Learning Completed
1.description: Complete study of 'Frontend Architecture Design' and related books

2.title: First Architecture Design Proposal
2.description: Independently complete frontend architecture design for a medium-sized project

1.title: Frontend Architecture Design Principles
1.description: Learn basic principles, patterns, and best practices of frontend architecture design

1.title: Frontend Architecture: From Entry to Micro-frontends

1.name: Personal Brand Website Architecture Refactoring
1.description: Redesign the architecture of the current personal website

successCriteria: Able to independently design frontend architecture for medium projects
Master modern architecture patterns like micro-frontends and module federation
Possess theoretical basis for architectural decisions

1.title: Frontend Architecture Design Proposal
1.description: Complete frontend architecture design document and implementation plan

3.title: Large-scale Project Architecture Practice
3.description: Lead or deeply participate in frontend architecture design for large projects

3.name: Expert Positioning Phase (12-18 Months)
objectives: Capability to handle complex technical issues

4.name: Architect Maturity Phase (18-24 Months)
objectives: Possess technical decision-making and team management capabilities
